*** SAVING INFO ***

Save data are saved in your browser and could be stored also in online storage. This will help you if you want to play from different browser or if local save is damaged. Local save also will not work after new version is published. 

How to get online id and start saving online:

1. click online button, fill in your wizard data and click "so be it" 2. click save 3. click online button again - you will see your id. write down your id.

How to import online data:

1. click "import from online" 2. fill your online id and click import

What if you started playing earlier and do not have online id?

Write me a message with your wizard name (at heeejhou@gmail.com) and i will send you your id.

Why can be saves broken?

This happens when new version of game is uploaded. I understand there are mechanisms in itch.io which "disconnect" your local browser save from the game, because new version is treated as a different game (simply said, im also not fully sure:D). Should this happen, please use online import.
